gui.socketmc.title: SocketMC
gui.socketmc.permission.required.tooltip: The permission for the mod to be enabled and work properly.
gui.socketmc.permission.use_gui.tooltip: Permission to manage the GUI. This permission includes everything used to manage what you see, confined to the game's operations, excluding screens.
gui.socketmc.permission.use_screens.tool: Permission to open and close default and user-generated screens.
gui.socketmc.permission.use_audio.toolti: Permission to use the audio system.
gui.socketmc.permission.external_applica: Permission to use external applications and integrations. Includes opening non-HTTP(S) links, such as 'mailto:' links.
gui.socketmc.permission.read_system_prop: Permission to read system properties, such as the operating system, Java version, and more.
gui.socketmc.permission.read_gui_propert: Permission to read GUI properties, such as the screen size, window size, and more.
gui.socketmc.permission.read_game_proper: Permission to read various client game properties, such as command history and in-game information.
gui.socketmc.permission.change_game_pref: Permission to change various soft game preferences, such as social interactions.
